statements: SELECT * FROM player_progress
SELECT player_id, progress_data FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, statistics FROM player_progress ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT player_id, achievements FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 2
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 3
SELECT player_id, progress_data FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, achievements FROM player_progress WHERE player_id > 100 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, statistics->'level' AS player_level FROM player_progress WHERE statistics->>'game' = 'awesome';
SELECT player_id, achievements->'completed' AS completed_achievements FROM player_progress WHERE achievements->>'type' = 'milestone' AND progress_data->>'active' = 'true';
SELECT player_id, progress_data->'level' AS current_level FROM player_progress WHERE progress_data->>'status' = 'active' ORDER BY progress_data->'level' DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_id, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level >= 3;
SELECT achievement_id, player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE completed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, completed_date FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players, MAX(level) AS max_level FROM player_progress;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_score FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 10;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE date_achieved >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_achieved ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_score, average_score FROM player_statistics WHERE average_score >= 75 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level = 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_score) AS total_score_sum FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE date_achieved >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_statistics ORDER BY games_played DESC, total_score DESC, average_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(average_score) AS avg_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(average_score) > 80;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, level FROM PlayerProgress WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM Achievements WHERE achievement_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played, total_wins FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE total_games_played > 100 ORDER BY total_wins DESC;
SELECT experience_name, rewards FROM GameplayExperiences WHERE difficulty_level < 3;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM PlayerProgress WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, total_wins, total_losses FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE total_games_played > 100 ORDER BY total_wins DESC;
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%Gold%' ORDER BY achievement_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM PlayerProgress JOIN PlayerStatistics ON PlayerProgress.player_id = PlayerStatistics.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_experience > 5000;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, games_played, games_won FROM players JOIN statistics ON players.player_id = statistics.player_id WHERE games_played > 100;
SELECT player_name, difficulty_preference FROM players JOIN gameplay_preferences ON players.player_id = gameplay_preferences.player_id WHERE theme_preference = 'Fantasy';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_experience > 1000;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id ORDER BY player_name ASC, achievement_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(games_played) AS max_games_played, MIN(games_won) AS min_games_won FROM statistics;
SELECT player_name, theme_preference FROM players INNER JOIN gameplay_preferences ON players.player_id = gameplay_preferences.player_id WHERE difficulty_preference = 'Hard';
